query:
-- Setze erste 7 Fragen auf correct
UPDATE question_progress 
SET firstAttemptStatus = 'correct', 
    status = 'answered',
    lastAttemptCorrect = 1,
    attemptCount = 1,
    lastAttemptAt = NOW()
WHERE userId = 7 
  AND questionId IN (30003, 30004, 30005, 30006, 30007, 30008, 30009);

-- Setze nächste 5 Fragen auf incorrect
UPDATE question_progress 
SET firstAttemptStatus = 'incorrect', 
    status = 'answered',
    lastAttemptCorrect = 0,
    attemptCount = 1,
    lastAttemptAt = NOW()
WHERE userId = 7 
  AND questionId IN (30010, 30011, 30012, 30013, 30014);
